property.filterExpression: ((source=='VMWareCollector' | source=='RSC-ESXPowerPathPerformance') & #APG:ALL | source='VSPHERE-EVENTS%' | source='VSPHERE-TASKS%') & devtype=='VirtualMachine' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & parttype=='Virtual Disk' & device=='Commfdups2'

((source=='VMWareCollector' | source=='RSC-ESXPowerPathPerformance') & #APG:ALL | source='VSPHERE-EVENTS%' | source='VSPHERE-TASKS%') & devtype=='VirtualMachine' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & parttype=='Virtual Disk' & device=='Commfdups2'

property.description: A short spike in CPU usage indicates that you are making the best use of the host resources. However, if thevalue is constantly high, the host is probably overcommitted. Generally, if the CPU usage value for a virtual machine is above 90%, performance is impacted.
Percentage of RAM used by the virtual machine.

property.filterExpression: ((source=='VMWareCollector' | source=='RSC-ESXPowerPathPerformance') & #APG:ALL | source='VSPHERE-EVENTS%' | source='VSPHERE-TASKS%') & devtype=='VirtualMachine' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & parttype=='Virtual Disk' & device=='mhmbd124 - vCenter Sandbox'

((source=='VMWareCollector' | source=='RSC-ESXPowerPathPerformance') & #APG:ALL | source='VSPHERE-EVENTS%' | source='VSPHERE-TASKS%') & devtype=='VirtualMachine' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & parttype=='Virtual Disk' & device=='mhmbd124 - vCenter Sandbox'
parttype=='Virtual Disk' & part='HARD%' & device=='mhmbd124 - vCenter Sandbox'
part=='System' & parttype=='Processor' & (name=='CurrentUtilization' | name=='Ready' | name=='UsageMHz') & device=='mhmbd124 - vCenter Sandbox'

property.description: A short spike in CPU usage indicates that you are making the best use of the host resources. However, if thevalue is constantly high, the host is probably overcommitted. Generally, if the CPU usage value for a virtual machine is above 90%, performance is impacted.

property.filterExpression: part=='System' & parttype=='Memory' & name=='CurrentUtilization' & device=='mhmbd124 - vCenter Sandbox'

property.description: Percentage of RAM used by the virtual machine.
